    Method
    Description
    private void
    HanoiGraphics.animateMoveDown(Disk disk, Point from, Point to)
    moves the disk straight down uses the timer delay ANIMATION_TIME
    private void
    HanoiGraphics.animateMoveOver(Disk disk, Point from, Point to)
    moves the disk across spindles then calls animateMoveDown uses the timer delay ANIMATION_TIME
    private void
    HanoiGraphics.animateMoveUp(Disk disk, Point from, Point to)
    moves the disk straight up then calls animateMoveOver uses the timer delay ANIMATION_TIME
